data: PED BIOCHEM Hypoglycemia Management (Module)
Status
Refer to Pediatric  Biochemical Genetics Hypoglycemia Management Algorithm
Glucagon is contraindicated in Glycogen Storage Disease
Communication Order
If patient has a POC Glucose Whole Blood readng less than _____ mmol/L, refer to the PED BIOCHEM Hypoglycemia Management Algorithm
Patient Care
POC Glucose Whole Blood
Monitor POC Glucose Whole Blood as per algorithm after every step of treatment has been administered
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider if blood glucose remains below _____ mmol/L following initial treatment
Diet/Nutrition
If patient is alert and can be treated with oral rapid acting carbohydrate
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions
Administer 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate, PO, once, PRN hypoglycemia
Administer  6 g of fast acting carbohydrate, PO, once, PRN hypoglycemia
Administer 9 g of fast acting carbohydrate, PO, once, PRN hypoglycemia
Continuous Infusions
If patient is unconscious and/or NPO / on TPN
dextrose 10% (D10W) bolus
2 mL/kg, IV, once, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: bag
Medications
dextrose
6 g, PO, as directed, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: tab
9 g, PO, as directed, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: tab
